title: Increasing cost industry, ATCs shift up in LR

content.question: For a perfectly competitive, increasing-cost industry, an increase in the industry’s demand will lead to which of the following in the long run?

choices.label: An upward shift in each firm’s long-run average cost curve
An increase in each firm’s profit
A decrease in the price of an input and a decrease in total industry profits
A decrease in total industry sales
A decrease in total producer surplus and an increase in total consumer surplus

content.answer: An upward shift in each firm’s long-run average cost curve
